meaning: back, amidst, in, reverse, inside, palm, sole, rear, lining, wrong side

onyomiExamples.meaning: back (side), reverse, other side, inside, background, dark side (e.g. of society), behind the scenes, beneath the surface
imperial palace, festival dolls representing the emperor and the empress

kunyomiExamples.meaning: opposite side, bottom, other side, side hidden from view, undersurface, reverse side, rear, back, behind, lining, inside, in the shadows, behind the scenes, offstage, behind (someone's) back, more (to something than meets the eye), hidden side (e.g. of one's personality), unknown circumstances, different side, proof, opposite (of a prediction, common sense, etc.), contrary, inverse (of a hypothesis, etc.), bottom (of an inning), last half (of an inning)
someone working behind-the-scenes, scene shifter, lady consort (to a high personage)
determining a speaker's true or hidden meaning, determining a speaker's intentions from his manner of speech, divining good or bad luck from listening to someone
